name: Code.Adazzle
body:
### Welcome to Code @ Adazzle
This is the public home for Code at [Adazzle](https://www.adazzle.com)
Adazzle brings efficiency, greater accuracy and insight to the media planning and procurement process, all built with some awesome tech.

## React Data Grid
We think [react](https://facebook.github.io/react/) [rocks](http://react.rocks) and use it a whole load at Adazzle.
[React Data Grid](https://adazzle.github.io/react-data-grid) is a Excel-like grid component built with React, with editors, keyboard navigation, copy & paste, and the like. It's simple to get going with, but pretty powerful. And designed to be lightening fast even when used for large data sets with complex editing.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
